channel.title: Activity specification turtle documents
channel.description:
I found this one: (not easy to find, ask me why!) * https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams-owl
But i miss the turtle file for https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams#activitypub
Any idea ? Thanks

item.title: Activity specification turtle documents
item.dc:creator: naturzukunft
item.description:
ok, so i’ve to eat that: https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams
However, at the end there are triples. Even that is hided.
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Activity specification turtle documents
item.dc:creator: nightpool
item.description:
Ultimately, the OWL files were just something provided on a best-effort basis by one of the previous group members, and they’re not well-maintained. The specifications in question are still the normative reference for these properties.

Read full topic

item.title: Activity specification turtle documents
item.dc:creator: kaniini
item.description:
ActivityPub is strictly built on JSON-LD. It is not valid to send Turtle or any other RDF serialization other than JSON-LD to an ActivityPub endpoint. Accordingly, ActivityPub vocabularies are only provided in JSON-LD format.

Read full topic
